GET./appointments/list: list all appointments for a patient
GET./appointments/<practitioner_id>: list all appointments for a practitioner

GET./practitioners/list: list all practitioners i had/will have an appointment with
GET./practitioner/<id>/appointments: get all appointments for a practitioner
GET./practitioner/locations: get all locations for a practitioner

POST./practitioner/location/create/<id>/: create a location for a practitioner
POST./practitioner/schedule/<id>/location/<lo: set the schedule for a practitioner in a location

GET./prescriptions/<patient_id>: list all prescriptions for a patient
